## Checklist

Please confirm your repository meets these requirements:

- [ ] Repository is public
- [ ] Each skill folder contains a valid `SKILL.md` file
- [ ] Skills follow the [Anthropic skills format](https://github.com/anthropics/skills)
- [ ] Repository contains original content (not copies of others' work)
- [ ] No malicious or harmful content
